hypothesis_content.title: Volatility Compression Breakout Regime Shift
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC 20-day realized volatility falls below 30% (compression) while price consolidates within 5% of 20-day high, a breakout above consolidation high with volume >1.5x 20-day average triggers regime shift to BULL within 5 trading days with 70% probability.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Extended low volatility during price consolidation near highs suggests accumulation before directional move. Breakout with elevated volume indicates institutional participation and regime change initiation.
entry_conditions: BTC price within 5% of 20-day high for at least 7 days
BTC breaks above consolidation high with volume >1.5x 20D average

exit_conditions.take_profit: 5% gain from entry OR regime shifts to BULL (confirmed by regime model)
exit_conditions.stop_loss: 3% loss from entry OR price returns below consolidation low
exit_conditions.time_exit: 5 trading days without regime shift confirmation

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Less than 60% of signals result in BULL regime within 5 days OR average return <2% during holding period.
